title: Why does my league client keeps on blurring out? Could anyone help! Thanks
body:
Well as the title says, for some reason everytime I open the League client or is in the League client, everything goes from normal to blurry and then back to normal again. 





 https://i.imgur.com/fLNRmkf.jpg   https://imgur.com/K3CPgeH  https://i.imgur.com/9brtKjw.jpg

replies.body:
Gross! Well let's see if we can find a solution to this together.

Let's first start by making sure that your video drivers are up to date and aren't having trouble by [**hitting up this guide over here**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting#wq1). Those are imperative to making sure both the game and the client are displayed properly.

Hit me back up with a response on whether or not that helps out!

Hey DatFatRaccoon thanks for your reply! It turns out that my video driver wasn't compatible with my GPU but after I reinstall the driver in another version, the game starts working normally. Thanks for your help :D
